main.name: Damian Domzalski
main.description: I am an open-minded and ambitious software engineer specializing in the Ruby ecosystem. In my approach to work, difficulties are challenges that I undertake with enthusiasm
main.bio: I am an open-minded and ambitious software engineer specializing in the Ruby ecosystem. My professional experience and passion for tackling technological challenges have steered me towards aspiring to a team leader role, a position in which I already have some experience. I am keen to utilize and expand my expertise in Ruby on Rails, further driving my dynamic career progression. In my approach to work, difficulties are challenges that I undertake with enthusiasm. My entire professional experience involves remote work, making me an efficient and proven remote team member. Outside of work, I am an active sports enthusiast, with a fondness for swimming, basketball, and martial arts. While I appreciate the flexibility and freedom of remote work, I am always ready for occasional in-person brainstorming sessions or project sprints.
